docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. Jeffrey Lieberman is the chairman of the psychiatry department at Columbia University College of Physicians and Surgeons and director of the college’s Lieber Center for Schizophrenia Research. He was also a principal investigator in a federal study that compared the effectiveness of an older schizophrenia drug with newer, more expensive drugs. The large, multisite study found that the older drug was generally as effective as the newer ones.
